languages.text: "За твоими словами не скрываются тени обмана, но все же... Я бы заметила. Непременно заметила то, о чем ты..." {n}Ирлиэт вытягивается натянутой струной и лицо ее кривится в сомнении.{/n} "Если бы каждый раз Вистенца не отправляла меня на поиски повстанцев, когда во дворце дают очередной бал. В леса, подальше от людских поселений".

"I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."
languages.original_text: "За твоими словами не скрываются тени обмана, но все же... Я бы заметила. Непременно заметила то, о чем ты..." {n}Ирлиэт вытягивается натянутой струной и лицо ее кривится в сомнении.{/n} "Если бы каждый раз Вистенца не отправляла меня на поиски повстанцев, когда во дворце дают очередной бал. В леса, подальше от людских поселений".

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉の裏に欺瞞の影は見当たらないが、それでも…我は気づいただろう。ええ、気づいたはず。その兆候に我は気づいたはずだ…」{n}ユリエットの顔は弦のように張り詰め、疑念が彼女の表情に忍び寄る。{/n}「ただし、ヴィステンツァが宮殿で舞踏会を催すたびに、彼女は我を遠くの森へと派遣した。人里から遠く離れた森の中に反乱者を探しに行かせるために」
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉の裏に欺瞞の影は見当たらないが、それでも…我は気づいただろう。ええ、気づいたはず。その兆候に我は気づいたはずだ…」{n}ユリエットの顔は弦のように張り詰め、疑念が彼女の表情に忍び寄る。{/n}「ただし、ヴィステンツァが宮殿で舞踏会を催すたびに、彼女は我を遠くの森へと派遣した。人里から遠く離れた森の中に反乱者を探しに行かせるために」

languages.text: « Je ne perçois aucun signe de duperie dans vos paroles, mais dans tous les cas... je m'en serais rendu compte. J'aurais été capable de déceler les signes que... » {n}Le visage d'Yrliet est tendu à l'extrême, et le doute s'insinue dans son regard.{/n} « Cependant, dès que Vistenza organisait un de ses concerts dans le palais, elle me donnait pour mission d'aller chasser les rebelles. Au fin fond de la forêt, loin des colonies humaines. »
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne perçois aucun signe de duperie dans vos paroles, mais dans tous les cas... je m'en serais rendu compte. J'aurais été capable de déceler les signes que... » {n}Le visage d'Yrliet est tendu à l'extrême, et le doute s'insinue dans son regard.{/n} « Cependant, dès que Vistenza organisait un de ses concerts dans le palais, elle me donnait pour mission d'aller chasser les rebelles. Au fin fond de la forêt, loin des colonies humaines. »

languages.text: “你的话语中没有任何欺骗的影子，而且就算真的有……我也会留意到的。如果你说了谎，你的谎言无法逃过我的目光……”{n}伊莉耶特绷着脸，仿佛绷紧的琴弦一样，脸上满是怀疑的意味。{/n}“不过，每当维丝坦萨在宫殿里举行舞会的时候，她都会命令我去寻找叛军的踪迹。把我派到森林里面，远离人们居住的地方。”
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语中没有任何欺骗的影子，而且就算真的有……我也会留意到的。如果你说了谎，你的谎言无法逃过我的目光……”{n}伊莉耶特绷着脸，仿佛绷紧的琴弦一样，脸上满是怀疑的意味。{/n}“不过，每当维丝坦萨在宫殿里举行舞会的时候，她都会命令我去寻找叛军的踪迹。把我派到森林里面，远离人们居住的地方。”

languages.text: «No percibo atisbo de engaño en tus palabras y aun así... me habría percatado. Sé que habría advertido las señales de que...». {n}El rostro de Yrliet se tensa como una cuerda y la duda hace mella en su expresión.{/n} «Si no fuera porque, siempre que Vistenza organiza un baile en palacio, me manda a buscar a los rebeldes. A los bosques, lejos de los asentamientos humanos».
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."

traits.locale_text: «No percibo atisbo de engaño en tus palabras y aun así... me habría percatado. Sé que habría advertido las señales de que...». {n}El rostro de Yrliet se tensa como una cuerda y la duda hace mella en su expresión.{/n} «Si no fuera porque, siempre que Vistenza organiza un baile en palacio, me manda a buscar a los rebeldes. A los bosques, lejos de los asentamientos humanos».

languages.text: "Ich sehe hinter Euren Worten keinen Schatten der Täuschung, und dennoch ... Es wäre mir aufgefallen. Ich weiß, ich hätte die Zeichen bemerkt, von denen Ihr ..." {n}Yrliets Gesicht spannt sich an wie eine gestraffte Sehne, und Zweifel kriechen in ihren Blick.{/n} "Aber wenn Vistenza eine ihre Tanzveranstaltungen im Palast abhält, schickt sie mich immer fort, um nach Rebellen zu suchen. In den Wald, weit weg von jeder menschlichen Siedlung."
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. I know I would have noticed the signs of which you..." {n}Yrliet's face tenses like a taut string, and doubt creeps into her expression.{/n} "Except, whenever Vistenza hosts one of her dances at the palace, she sends me away to search for the rebels. Into the forests, far from human settlements."

Ich weiß, ich hätte die Zeichen bemerkt, von denen Ihr ..." {n}Yrliets Gesicht spannt sich an wie eine gestraffte Sehne, und Zweifel kriechen in ihren Blick.{/n} "Aber wenn Vistenza eine ihre Tanzveranstaltungen im Palast abhält, schickt sie mich immer fort, um nach Rebellen zu suchen. In den Wald, weit weg von jeder menschlichen Siedlung."

languages.text: "Sözlerinde aldatmaca izleri göremiyorum ancak öyle bir şeyi fark ederdim. Sözünü ettiğin şeylerin ibarelerini fark etmemem olanaksız..." {n}Yrliet'in yüzü olabildiğince geriliyor ve yüz ifadesinde şüphe yer edinmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Düşünüyorum da... Vistenza ne zaman sarayda dans partisi düzenlese beni isyancıları aramaya gönderirdi. Ormana, insan yerleşim yerlerinden uzağa."
languages.original_text: "I see no shadows of deceit behind your words, and even so... I would have noticed. Into the forests, far from human settlements."
